name.en-US: An Instagram Xposed module with features like Developer Options, Ghost Mode, Ad-Free browsing, and Distraction-Free Mode.

description.en-US:
InstaEclipse âš¡ Enhance Your Instagram Experience!

InstaEclipse is an LSPosed module designed to enhance your Instagram experience with advanced features like developer options, ghost mode, distraction-free mode, and more! ğŸš€

This module is built to stay compatible with new Instagram releases by leveraging dynamic analysis to locate targeted classes and methods automatically. ğŸ§ âœ¨

ğŸš« Remove Ads

ğŸ› ï¸ Installation Instructions

1ï¸âƒ£ Install the Module

  • Download and install the InstaEclipse APK. You can find the latest release here.

2ï¸âƒ£ Enable the Module in LSPosed

  • Open the LSPosed Manager.

3ï¸âƒ£ Open the Module

4ï¸âƒ£ Configure Your Features

5ï¸âƒ£ Restart Instagram

  • Go back to the Home Tab in the InstaEclipse module.

ğŸ“– FAQ

â“ Module not enabled?

Disable and re-enable the module in LSPosed.

â“ Features not working?

Force stop and restart Instagram.

â“ Developer options causing crashes?

Follow the provided instructions for developer options and ensure youâ€™re using Alpha or Beta versions of Instagram.

â“ Why are some labels obfuscated or numbered?

This is due to obfuscation in Stable versions of Instagram. Use Beta or Alpha versions to avoid this.

â“ Distraction-Free Mode enabled, but content still appears?

Force stop Instagram and clear its cache to apply the changes properly.
